name: unconcernedly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows someone is not worried or interested: "I hardly knew her at all," said Guy, unconcernedly. I was about to ride by unconcernedly, when a soldier came out from the bushes and stopped me. See
unconcerned
More examplesFewer examplesSheep and cattle were grazing unconcernedly among the stones.She came to a kitchen where two women were chatting unconcernedly.They merely shrugged unconcernedly and yelled something that was snatched away by the wind.
